title: Script not loading!!!

comments.body: Mate, you've got a typo. That says scipt not script!

title: git merge isn't merging
text:
I tried to merge from one of my branches to my main branch but it's put me in some sort of text editor?


I'm not quite sure where I am, I don't know how to get out of this editor, i'm worried that if I try alt+f4 i'll just lose everything

comments.body: OP here - turns out I was in VIM, managed to get out!

title: Light mode vs dark mode
text: The eternal debate... why would you ever use light mode? It just hurts my eyes!
